sentences.en: Whatever else it is, higher education is not a bastion of excellence.
sentences.cn: 不管它是什么，高等教育都不是卓越的堡垒。

sentences.en: I've even entered the last bastion of greendom—installing a composting toilet.
sentences.cn: 我甚至进入了绿色世界的最后堡垒——安装一个堆肥厕所。

sentences.en: Like an iron bastion, the dam withstood the rushing floodwaters.
sentences.cn: 大坝好似铜墙铁壁，顶住了洪水的冲击。
